The address of the token to burn.

getOrComputeTobinTax().return: The tobin tax amount as a fraction.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.spender: The address that is to be no longer allowed to spend Reserve funds.

params.index: The index of the token in _tokens.
params.token: The address of the token no longer being stabilized.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.value: The number of seconds to cache the tobin tax value for.

params.to: The address that will receive the gold.
params.value: The amount of gold to transfer.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

devdoc.title: Ensures price stability of StableTokens with respect to their pegs

addSpender(address).notice: Gives an address permission to spend Reserve funds.

addToken(address).notice: Add a token that the reserve will stablize.

burnToken(address).notice: Burns all tokens held by the Reserve.

getOrComputeTobinTax().notice: Returns the tobin tax, recomputing it if it's stale.

removeSpender(address).notice: Takes away an address's permission to spend Reserve funds.

removeToken(address,uint256).notice: Remove a token that the reserve will no longer stabilize.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setTobinTaxStalenessThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets the number of seconds to cache the tobin tax value for.
